page.title: Zoom X5 ADSL Router Series 1083, Model 5754

revision.text:

|brand = Zoom |model = 5754 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = router, dsl modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = BDNDL01B1083 |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM6332;BCM6332KFBG, HS1019 P12, 973529 N1; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = BMIPS3300 |cpu1spd = 240 <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q16BVSIG; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 8 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM638165TS-6G; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM5325E;BCM5325EKQMG, HG1003 P11, 956766 1A; |cm_down_c = |cm_up_c = |docsisver = |voip_ports = |wan_ports = <!-- 1 --> |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:25:5E
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = CFE;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.8.1;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.7 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, J5,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = DSL (ADSL2+) Line Driver;Broadcom;BCM6301;BROADCOM, 6301KSG, TD1018P1;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = zoomadsl |manuf = DareGlobal |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 2010 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 726947109858 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B003VX1CKU |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "PWB: T0047618B-PL", "DAT: 2009.10.23", and a date code of '''15.10''' is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:Zoom X5 ADSL Router Series 1083, Model 5754.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]] <center>'''User Images''' <gallery caption="internal" mode="slideshow"> File:Zoom_5754_board_top_1.jpg|board top File:Zoom_5754_BCM6332KPBG_SoC.jpg|BCM6332 SoC File:Zoom_5754_BCM5325E_FE_Switch.jpg|BCM5325E FE Switch File:Zoom_5754_DareGlobal_PN.jpg|DareGlobal board text File:Zoom_5754_board_bot.jpg|board bottom File:Zoom_5754_DareGlobal_label.jpg|board MAC label File:Zoom_5754_W25Q16BVSIG_Flash.jpg|Flash File:Zoom_5754_RAM.jpg|RAM File:Zoom_5754_BCM6301_AFE.jpg|BCM6301 AFE </gallery></center>{{#set:Has images=internal}}
